H3.text: who fought in the gulf war 1991. Iraq

A4.text: The Gulf War was an armed conflict between Iraq and a 42-country coalition led by the United States.

A5.text: Saudi Arabia, the United Kingdom, and Egypt were the largest following contributors to the coalition's military power.
